matches.title: Adobe Reader

cve.summary: Buffer overflow in Adobe Reader allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

matches.remediation: Update to the latest version via Adobe's official website.

matches.title: Windows Defender

cve.summary: Privilege escalation vulnerability in Windows Defender service.

matches.remediation: Install the latest Windows security patch (KB5021234).

matches.title: Microsoft Edge

cve.summary: Out-of-bounds write vulnerability in Microsoft Edge memory heap.

matches.remediation: Update Edge to the latest version via Windows Update.
